descriptionHtml:
This is a mod for those who are tired of their ride dying off.

These horse will stay where you put them, and if you find them helping in battle try not to hit them. get on them if they start to attack and fast travle if not sneak away from them and save with the cursor pointed away. the will get low on health if you undergo consistant battles with no rest, they will flee instead of attacking. make sure you have the heal other spell on hand when this occurs. the idea of Rastlin and Camron where horses that I created back on Oblivion.

Find these horse an they are yours to ride. However you may need to find a place to put the two while you ride the third one. There is more pics of the horses with the file download.

Mods in use:
Dogs of skyrim
Cats of Skyrim
Birds of Skyrim
hilltop home - my own mod not up yet
author: Twinz
